CompleteAccount.body:
{{{name}}}, it's Seasons. You're in. You'll soon have access to hundreds of new styles without the stress of commitment.

To finish setting up your membership, login at {{{webChoosePlanLink}}}, then select a plan. 

Due to demand, your invitation will expire in 48 hours. If you have any questions please contact {{{contactEmail}}}.

TwentyFourHourLeftAuthorizationFollowup.body:
Hi {{{name}}}, you have 24 hours left to secure your spot! Remember, if we don’t hear from you, we’ll pass along your invite to the next person in line and you’ll be waitlisted. {{{webChoosePlanLink}}}.

If you need help finding your first reservation, follow this link {{{stylistLink}}} to book some one on one time with our stylist.

Rewaitlisted.body:
{{{name}}}, your signup window has closed. Due to demand, we've had to give your spot to the next person in line.

If you'd still like to obtain a membership, please contact us at {{{contactEmail}}}.
